## {{< fa circle-question >}} What is this workshop all about?

This workshop is designed to provide you with an introduction to the principles of FAIR data publishing. It draws from experiences and workflows established by the [Global Health Engineering group at ETH Zurich](https://ghe.ethz.ch/) and through their work on the [openwashdata community](https://openwashdata.org/).
